channel.title: Which is a good site to get vps..with guide?
channel.description: Hey guys first off i am planning on recoding servers which i use to do back 2 years ago.I always ran them on my computer,now im thinking of running one on a vps.I have a question:which is a good site to buy a vps from That might have guides on how to run your runescape private server?

item.title: Which is a good site to get vps..with guide?
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

boby1:

sorry guys i haven’t used Moparscape in a long time. anyways…so if i buy a windows vps will i be setting up my server on it same way as i would on my computer?Download Java,No-ip.biz,Port forward? should i be looking for a 1gb vps for starting off my server?Are there any other good windows vps sites? burst.net doesnt seem to let me buy windows vps LOL.

1and1.com has some nice vps from what I hear

you don’t need to port/no-ip on a vps… you may need to port the vps firewall but that’s about it

Read full topic
item.source: Which is a good site to get vps..with guide?
